Plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.
Title: Wag the Dog
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 18 nominations.
Actors: Dustin Hoffman, Robert De Niro, Anne Heche, Woody Harrelson
Writer: Larry Beinhart (book), Hilary Henkin (screenplay), David Mamet (screenplay)
